snippet: After working on the sitcom “Barney Miller,” Mr. Weege developed the quirky comedy “Night Court,” which ran from 1984 until 1992.
abstract: Reinhold Weege, writer of popular sitcoms, dies at age 62.
lead_paragraph: After working on the sitcom “Barney Miller,” Mr. Weege developed the quirky comedy “Night Court,” which ran from 1984 until 1992.

headline.seo: Reinhold Weege, 62, Creator of ‘Night Court,’ Dies
headline.main: Reinhold Weege, Creator of ‘Night Court,’ Dies at 62
